title: what is the distance between k

parts.text: [SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:46 AM, Date: Monday, February 02, 2026 | USER: None] what is the distance between khammam and  hyderabad

The approximate road distance between Khammam and Hyderabad is around **180 to 200 kilometers (112 to 124 miles)**, depending on the specific route taken.

The travel time by road usually ranges from **3.5 to 4.5 hours**, depending on traffic conditions and the type of vehicle.
[SYSTEM: Current Time: 11:47 AM, Date: Monday, February 02, 2026 | USER: None] can you find the best route in google maps to reach from khammam to hyderabad

Yes, I can guide you on how to find the best route on Google Maps from Khammam to Hyderabad!

The most common and generally best route involves taking National Highway 65 (NH65).

Here's how you can find it yourself on Google Maps:

1.  **Open Google Maps:** Go to [maps.google.com](https://maps.google.com) or open the Google Maps app on your smartphone.
2.  **Click on Directions:** Look for the blue "Directions" icon (it often looks like a diamond with an arrow inside) or a search bar where you can type.
3.  **Enter Starting Point:** In the "A" or "Start location" field, type **"Khammam"**.
4.  **Enter Destination:** In the "B" or "Choose destination" field, type **"Hyderabad"**.
5.  **View Route Options:** Google Maps will automatically display the primary route. You'll usually see a few options (e.g., "fastest," "shortest," "avoid tolls"). The main route will likely be highlighted.

**General Route Description (Most Common):**

You'll typically head out of Khammam towards **Suryapet**. From Suryapet, you'll connect to **NH65**, which is a major highway that will take you directly to Hyderabad.

This route often looks like: **Khammam -> Suryapet -> Choutuppal -> Hayathnagar -> Hyderabad.**

Google Maps will give you the most up-to-date information on traffic, estimated travel time, and any potential road closures.
